description.zh-cn: 伊朗保守主义和原则主义派政治家、法基赫，曾任伊朗总统、伊朗司法总监等职。因在1988年伊朗处决政治犯事件中的角色而受到争议和美国制裁。2024年5月19日因直升机坠毁事故逝世，被外界广泛认为是最高领袖哈梅内伊的接班人选之一。
description.en: An Iranian conservative and principlist politician and jurist who served as the President of Iran and Chief Justice of Iran. He was controversial for his role in the 1988 executions of Iranian political prisoners and was sanctioned by the United States. He died in a helicopter crash on May 19, 2024, and was widely considered a potential successor to Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗最高领袖。曾是易卜拉欣·莱希的上司和培训者，并任命其担任司法总监。易卜拉欣·莱希被广泛认为是其接班人之一。
description.en: Supreme Leader of Iran. He was Ebrahim Raisi's superior and mentor, and appointed him as Chief Justice. Ebrahim Raisi was widely considered one of his potential successors.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗前总统，政治立场为温和派。在2017年总统选举中击败易卜拉欣·莱希，并在2021年任期届满后由莱希接替。
description.en: Former President of Iran with a moderate political stance. He defeated Ebrahim Raisi in the 2017 presidential election and was succeeded by Raisi after his term ended in 2021.

nodes.id: 2024年瓦尔扎甘直升机坠毁事故

zh-cn: 2024年瓦尔扎甘直升机坠毁事故

description.zh-cn: 导致时任伊朗总统易卜拉欣·莱希和外交部长侯赛因·阿米尔-阿卜杜拉希扬等人遇难的直升机坠毁事件。
description.en: A helicopter crash that resulted in the deaths of then-Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi, Foreign Minister Hossein Amir-Abdollahian, and others.

nodes.id: 侯赛因·阿米尔-阿卜杜拉希扬

zh-cn: 侯赛因·阿米尔-阿卜杜拉希扬

description.zh-cn: 伊朗外交部长，在易卜拉欣·莱希总统任内任职，并与莱希在2024年瓦尔扎甘直升机坠毁事故中一同遇难。
description.en: Foreign Minister of Iran who served during the presidency of Ebrahim Raisi and died alongside him in the 2024 Varzaqan helicopter crash.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗政治人物。在易卜拉欣·莱希担任总统期间任副总统，并在莱希逝世后代理总统职务。
description.en: Iranian politician. He served as Vice President during Ebrahim Raisi's presidency and became acting president after Raisi's death.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗第二大城市和什叶派圣地，是易卜拉欣·莱希的出生地和安葬地。
description.en: The second-largest city in Iran and a holy city for Shia Muslims, it is the birthplace and burial place of Ebrahim Raisi.

description.zh-cn: 位于德黑兰的一所大学，易卜拉欣·莱希在此获得伊斯兰法学博士学位。
description.en: A university in Tehran where Ebrahim Raisi obtained his PhD in Islamic Jurisprudence.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗库姆市的什叶派神学院，易卜拉欣·莱希曾在此学习。
description.en: A Shia seminary in the city of Qom, Iran, where Ebrahim Raisi studied.

description.zh-cn: 1988年，伊朗政府对数千名政治犯执行死刑的事件。易卜拉欣·莱希被指控是负责此次处决的“死亡委员会”成员之一。
description.en: An event in 1988 where the Iranian government executed thousands of political prisoners. Ebrahim Raisi is accused of being a member of the 'death committee' responsible for these executions.

description.zh-cn: 22岁的伊朗女性玛莎·阿米尼因“不当”佩戴头巾被道德警察拘留后死亡的事件，此事在伊朗及全球引发了大规模抗议活动。
description.en: The death of Mahsa Amini, a 22-year-old Iranian woman, in the custody of the morality police for allegedly wearing her hijab 'improperly'. Her death sparked large-scale protests in Iran and worldwide.

description.zh-cn: 由玛莎·阿米尼之死引发的，反对伊朗政府及其强制头巾政策的大规模抗议活动。莱希政府对此采取了镇压措施。
description.en: Large-scale protests against the Iranian government and its mandatory hijab laws, sparked by the death of Mahsa Amini. The Raisi administration responded with a crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 世界上的主要大国之一。其政府因易卜拉欣·莱希在侵犯人权方面的记录而对他实施制裁。
description.en: One of the world's major powers. Its government imposed sanctions on Ebrahim Raisi for his record on human rights abuses.

description.zh-cn: 中东地区的逊尼派大国。在易卜拉欣·莱希任内，与伊朗在断交七年后恢复了外交关系。
description.en: A major Sunni power in the Middle East. During Ebrahim Raisi's presidency, it restored diplomatic relations with Iran after a seven-year break.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯总统。在易卜拉欣·莱希担任伊朗总统期间，两人曾多次会面。
description.en: President of Russia. During Ebrahim Raisi's term as President of Iran, the two met on multiple occasions.

description.zh-cn: 阿里·哈梅内伊的儿子。在易卜拉欣·莱希去世后，被外界认为是伊朗最高领袖的热门继承人选之一。
description.en: Son of Ali Khamenei. After the death of Ebrahim Raisi, he is considered by outsiders to be one of the leading candidates to succeed the Supreme Leader of Iran.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的国家，实行伊斯兰神权政治。在易卜拉欣·莱希总统任内，该国与沙特阿拉伯恢复外交关系，并与俄罗斯关系密切。
description.en: A country in Western Asia governed as an Islamic theocracy. During President Ebrahim Raisi's term, the country restored diplomatic relations with Saudi Arabia and maintained close ties with Russia.

description.zh-cn: 易卜拉欣·莱希的妻子，在德黑兰沙希德·贝赫什提大学任教。
description.en: Wife of Ebrahim Raisi, she teaches at Shahid Beheshti University in Tehran.

zh-cn: 艾哈迈德·阿拉莫勒霍达
阿亚图拉·艾哈迈德·阿莫勒霍达

description.zh-cn: 伊朗马什哈德的周五聚礼拜伊玛目，易卜拉欣·莱希的岳父。
description.en: The Friday prayer imam of Mashhad, Iran, and the father-in-law of Ebrahim Raisi.

description.zh-cn: 1979年推翻巴列维王朝并导致伊朗伊斯兰共和国成立的革命。易卜拉欣·莱希是该革命的坚定支持者，并在革命后的新政权中开始其政治生涯。
description.en: The 1979 revolution that overthrew the Pahlavi dynasty and led to the establishment of the Islamic Republic of Iran. Ebrahim Raisi was a staunch supporter of the revolution and began his political career in the new regime that followed.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗阿亚图拉，曾为霍梅尼指定的继承人。他公开反对1988年对政治犯的处决，称其为“伊斯兰共和国历史上最大的罪行”，随后失势。
description.en: An Iranian Ayatollah, once the designated successor to Khomeini. He publicly opposed the 1988 executions of political prisoners, calling them 'the greatest crime in the history of the Islamic Republic,' and subsequently fell from favor.

description.zh-cn: 莱希曾接受时任伊朗总统阿里·哈梅内伊的培训。后来，作为最高领袖的哈梅内伊任命莱希为司法总监。在莱希担任总统期间，哈梅内伊是伊朗的最高领袖，为莱希的直接上级。
description.en: Raisi was trained by then-President Ali Khamenei. Later, as Supreme Leader, Khamenei appointed Raisi as Chief Justice. During Raisi's presidency, Khamenei was the Supreme Leader of Iran, making him Raisi's direct superior.

description.zh-cn: 阿里·哈梅内伊任命易卜拉欣·莱希担任伊朗司法总监。
description.en: Ali Khamenei appointed Ebrahim Raisi to the position of Chief Justice of Iran.

description.zh-cn: 易卜拉欣·莱希在2017年伊朗总统选举中作为哈桑·鲁哈尼的主要竞争对手，但最终落败。
description.en: Ebrahim Raisi was the main competitor to Hassan Rouhani in the 2017 Iranian presidential election, but was ultimately defeated.

relationships.source: 2024年瓦尔扎甘直升机坠毁事故

description.zh-cn: 易卜拉欣·莱希在此次直升机坠毁事故中身亡。
description.en: Ebrahim Raisi was killed in this helicopter crash.

relationships.source: 2024年瓦尔扎甘直升机坠毁事故
relationships.target: 侯赛因·阿米尔-阿卜杜拉希扬

description.zh-cn: 侯赛因·阿米尔-阿卜杜拉希扬与总统莱希同乘一架直升机，在此次事故中身亡。
description.en: Hossein Amir-Abdollahian was on the same helicopter as President Raisi and was killed in this crash.

description.zh-cn: 莱希在沙希德·莫塔哈里大学获得了伊斯兰法学博士学位。
description.en: Raisi obtained his PhD in Islamic Jurisprudence from Shahid Motahari University.

description.zh-cn: 莱希15岁时前往库姆进入什叶派神学院学习。
description.en: At the age of 15, Raisi went to Qom to study at the Shia seminary.

description.zh-cn: 在易卜拉欣·莱希担任总统期间，穆罕默德·穆赫贝尔是其第一副总统。
description.en: During Ebrahim Raisi's presidency, Mohammad Mokhber was his First Vice President.

relationships.source: 侯赛因·阿米尔-阿卜杜拉希扬

description.zh-cn: 侯赛因·阿米尔-阿卜杜拉希扬在易卜拉欣·莱希的内阁中担任外交部长。
description.en: Hossein Amir-Abdollahian served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs in Ebrahim Raisi's cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 莱希被认为是“死亡委员会”的成员之一，该委员会在1988年对数千名政治犯判处死刑。
description.en: Raisi is believed to have been a member of the 'death committee' that sentenced thousands of political prisoners to death in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 侯赛因-阿里·蒙塔泽里公开谴责了1988年的处决事件，称其为“伊斯兰共和国历史上最大的罪行”。
description.en: Hussein-Ali Montazeri publicly condemned the 1988 executions, calling them 'the greatest crime in the history of the Islamic Republic'.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府根据13876号行政命令，因易卜拉欣·莱希涉及“侵犯人权”而对其进行制裁。
description.en: The U.S. government sanctioned Ebrahim Raisi under Executive Order 13876 for his involvement in 'human rights abuses'.

description.zh-cn: 玛莎·阿米尼在被拘留期间死亡的事件，引发了全国范围内的大规模抗议活动（阿米尼示威）。
description.en: The death of Mahsa Amini in custody sparked nationwide large-scale protests (the Mahsa Amini protests).

description.zh-cn: 作为时任总统，莱希政府对因玛莎·阿米尼之死引发的抗议活动采取了镇压措施，包括逮捕和判处死刑。
description.en: As the president at the time, Raisi's government cracked down on the protests sparked by the death of Mahsa Amini, including arrests and death sentences.

description.zh-cn: 作为伊朗总统，莱希于2022年7月在德黑兰会见普京，并于2023年12月回访莫斯科。
description.en: As President of Iran, Raisi met with Putin in Tehran in July 2022 and made a return visit to Moscow in December 2023.

description.zh-cn: 在易卜拉欣·莱希担任总统期间，伊朗与沙特阿拉伯在断交七年后，于2023年3月同意恢复外交关系。
description.en: During the presidency of Ebrahim Raisi, Iran and Saudi Arabia agreed to restore diplomatic relations in March 2023, after a seven-year break.

description.zh-cn: 易卜拉欣·莱希全力支持1979年的伊朗伊斯兰革命，并在革命后建立的新政权下开启了他的司法和政治生涯。
description.en: Ebrahim Raisi fully supported the 1979 Iranian Islamic Revolution, which launched his judicial and political career under the newly established regime.
